error_auth_invalid_credential: The email or password is incorrect or not found. Please try again.
error_auth_email_already_in_use: That email is already registered. Try logging in or use a different email.
error_auth_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
error_auth_user_disabled: This account is currently disabled. Please contact support.
error_auth_user_not_found: We couldn't find that email. Would you like to create an account?
error_auth_account_exists_with_different: This email is already in use. Please try another email address.
error_auth_network_request_failed: No internet connection. Please check your network and try again.
error_auth_too_many_requests: You’ve made too many attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
error_auth_invalid_phone_number: Invalid phone number. Please check the format and try again.
error_auth_quota_exceeded: You’ve exceeded the message limit. Please try again later.
error_auth_session_expired: Your session has expired. Please try again.
error_auth_sms_timeout: Verification code timed out. Please try again.
error_auth_invalid_verification_code: Incorrect verification code. Please double-check and try again.
error_auth_default: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error_auth_otp_send_failed: We couldn't send the OTP. Please try again later.
error_auth_otp_expired: Your OTP has expired. Please request a new one.
error_auth_otp_invalid: The OTP is invalid. Please try again.
error_auth_google_interrupted: Sign-in was interrupted. Please try again.
error_auth_google_error: Something went wrong with Google sign-in.
error_api_timeout: The connection has timed out. Please try again.
error_api_no_connection: No internet connection. Please check your network.
error_api_unexpected: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error_api_invalid_request: Your request could not be processed.
error_api_not_found: The requested resource was not found.
error_api_server_error: A server error occurred. Please try again.
error_data_permission_denied: You don’t have permission to do that.
error_data_not_found: We couldn’t find what you requested.
error_data_unavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error_data_unauthenticated: You need to sign in again to continue.
error_data_invalid_argument: Some of the information you entered is invalid.
error_data_general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error_platform_general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
validators_name_short: Name must be at least 3 characters
validators_password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
validators_phone_short: Phone number must be at least 10 digits
validators_phone_long: Phone number must be at most 15 digits
validators_url_invalid: Enter a valid URL (http or https)
auth_sign_in_with_phone_number_desc: Sawa will verify your phone number to get you started.
auth_verify_otp_not_verified: Your verification code is not verified yet. Please check your inbox.
auth_verify_otp_verified: Your verification code has been verified!
auth_verify_otp_desc_1: We’ve sent a verification code to
auth_verify_otp_initial_success: We've sent you a verification code.
auth_verify_otp_resend_success: We've sent a new verification code to your email.
auth_verify_otp_pop_warning_1: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
auth_verify_otp_pop_warning_2: You will need to verify your code again.
auth_complete_your_profile_desc: Let’s personalize your account to complete your profile.
auth_phone_field_hint: Enter your phone number after the country code
